traits.name: Aura of Murder
entries: As long as the night blade is not {@condition incapacitated}, hostile creatures within 5 feet of it gain vulnerability to piercing damage unless they have resistance or immunity to such damage.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
